name: Flow ERC721
desc: An ERC721 token that can be minted using any of the deployed Flow expressions. This token can be made conditionally soulbound by using the 'can transfer' expression.

methods.desc: Deploys a new Flow ERC721 contract.

expressions.name: Can transfer
expressions.desc: An expression that determines whether this token can be transferred. Mint and burns must be handled by the flow expressions.

cells.name: Caller
cells.desc: The contract or EOA that called transfer

cells.name: This contract
cells.desc: The address of the FlowERC721 contract this expression is for

cells.name: From
cells.desc: The address this token is being transferred from

cells.name: To
cells.desc: The address this token is being transferred from

cells.name: Token ID
cells.desc: The ID of the token being transferred

cells.name: Batch size
cells.desc: If a mint transfer, the number of tokens minted. Batch size is always non-zero

expressions.name: Flows
expressions.desc: The available flows for this token.
